title: Gemini 3 Pro vs Google Document AI: Which AI Tool is Better in 2026?
metaDescription: Compare Gemini 3 Pro vs Google Document AI. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2026.
introduction: Choosing between Gemini 3 Pro and Google Document AI? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Gemini 3 Pro vs Google Document AI
paragraphs: Gemini 3 Pro (llms) is Gemini 3 Pro is Google's latest flagship AI model, launched in 2026 with groundbreaking multimodal capabilities. It achieves a 76.2% score on SWE-bench Verified (surpassing Claude Sonnet 4.5's 70%), features a 1M token context window with 64K output, and uniquely offers full native video processing alongside text and images. Its key differentiator is best-in-class reasoning combined with true multimodal understanding including video, making it ideal for complex analysis and agentic workflows.. It's known for llm, multimodal, video-understanding.

Google Document AI (nlp) is Google Document AI is a cloud-based platform that uses machine learning to automatically parse, classify, and extract structured data from scanned and digital documents. It targets businesses and developers looking to automate document-intensive workflows, offering pre-trained models for common document types and the ability to build custom processors. Its key differentiator is deep integration with the Google Cloud ecosystem and its use of Google's foundational AI research to deliver high-accuracy extraction with minimal configuration.. Users choose it for document-processing, intelligent-document-processing, optical-character-recognition.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Gemini 3 Pro: 76.2% SWE-bench Verified score (highest available), 1M token context window with 64K output, Native video processing (unique among all models)

Google Document AI: Pre-trained processors for invoices, receipts, ID documents, contracts, and utility bills, Custom processor training for unique document layouts and data fields, Advanced OCR with handwriting recognition and layout preservation

verdict: Both Gemini 3 Pro and Google Document AI are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Gemini 3 Pro for llm, Google Document AI for document-processing.
